description:
Lightweight, moisture wicking and comfortable, the ODLO Essentials seamless running t-shirt is a sleekly made, warm weather training must. Made with seamless tech for supreme comfort, this t-shirt has a body mapped mesh graphic for superior breathability and reflective detailing for greater visibility as the light fades. Finally, this performance piece is treated with ZeroScent - a bio-based antimicrobial finish that keeps scents at bay, even as the miles and training days add up. Warm summer days. The perfect training companion.

Why they made it: Training, Running
name: Odlo Essential Seamless Crew Neck SS - Mens
